resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Apptentive is a feedback and communication service which allows the people who make this app to quickly get your feedback and better listen to you.
Your feedback is hosted by Apptentive and is subject to Apptentive's privacy policy and the privacy policy of the developer of this app.
Please connect to the internet to send feedback.
It looks like we're having trouble accessing feedback. Please wait a bit and try again.
We're unable to find this app in the store. Please visit the store to find and rate it.
We're so happy to hear that you love %s! It'd be really helpful if you rated us. Thanks so much for spending some time with us.
Amazon Appstore was not found. Please install Amazon Appstore before rating this app.
Google Play was not found. Please install Google Play before rating this app.
MiKandi Market was not found. Please install MiKandi Market before rating this app.
You reached the maximum number of images
Let the app access your camera and photos in the settings. Of course we will only upload photos you choose.

This library allows you to include vector icons everywhere in your project. No limits are given. Scale with no limit, use any Color at any time, provide a contour, and many additional customizations
FastAdapter, the bullet proof, fast and easy to use adapter library, which minimizes developing time to a fraction...
MaterialDrawer the flexible, easy to use, all in one drawer library for your Android project.
Materialize comes with useful helper classes, the complete material color palette, and many additional utils. Use its theme as base. Let it manage your StatusBar, NavigationBar, Fullscreen behavior…
Show/Hide Password EditText is a very simple extension of Android's EditText that puts a clickable hide/show icon in the right hand side of the EditText that allows showing of the password.

Your favourite ads all in one place, on any device.
Update or promote your ads for more views, then delete them once sold.

Hi %s, your search has been saved.
Meet up to sell your item, discover your next job or find yourself a plumber.
When you post an ad we'll show it here.
Posting your ad takes seconds. Simply add a couple of photos, write a short description and submit.

Don't waste your money on a car that has been stolen, scrapped or written off.
A quick car check (£2.99) or valuation (£1.49) helps you:
Save time before you visit a seller.
Feel confident before you hand over your money.
We'll send you a notification if we find new ads that match your saved searches.
Sorry, we know this is not ideal. We're on the case.
Your ad appears in a highlighted section
More people read and reply to Featured ads because of their prominent position at the top
You can choose to feature your ad for 3, 7 or 14 days
By tapping 'ACCEPT' you agree to be bound by the Gumtree Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
Appear in prime position on our main site homepage for users searching in your ads' location
Your ad will appear in rotation in the spotlight gallery for 1 week
Login and go to "Manage my ads"
Find your ad, edit and post again
Follow the confirmation process to get your ad live
An urgent label appears next to your ad in listing and search results
Urgent is ideal if you need to sell, rent or hire quickly
Ads are marked as Urgent for 7 days
Tip: Give as much information as you can. The clearer your description, the more replies you’ll get.
Tip: Upload as many images as you can – ads with good pictures get more views and replies!
